content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ARM
      operator: empty
    - name: ARMNRS
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000046
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Verify ARMNRS is not null when ARM is null
Outcome:
  Message: ARMNRS is missing when ARM value is missing
  Output Variables:
    - ARM
    - ARMNRS
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0519
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: With the exception of studies which use multi-stage
                  Arm assignments, must be a value of ARM in the Trial Arms Dataset.
                  If the subject was not assigned to an Arm, ARM is null and ARMNRS
                  is populated.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Verify ARMNRS is not null when ARM is null

Outcome.Message: ARMNRS is missing when ARM value is missing

Citations.Cited_Guidance: With the exception of studies which use multi-stage Arm assignments, must be a value of ARM in the Trial Arms Dataset. If the subject was not assigned to an Arm, ARM is null and ARMNRS is populated.
